name: Ben Rayment Prototypes
description:
These are various experimental game design prototypes that I'm currently working on. 

The first is Four Seasons, a prototype made in Processing. It simulates the feeling of being in each season of the year.

The second is Gravity Run, an endless runner where you must survive using the power of your anti-gravity watch to progress through the level. It was built using Unity.

The third is Burn Rubber, a 3D Racing game where you compete against an AI controlled rival to claim victory. It was also built in Unity.

The fourth prototype is Jump The Gorge, a bridge constructing game where you use physical pieces of paper to construct a bridge for the car to go across.
